name: INFEST:STATION Endless Swarm
description:
Jump in your starship and take on an endless swarm of aliens looking to infest the cosmos. You've got 3 Ships and an endless supply of plasma shots to see how many you can take out.

You cannot stop the infestation, but you can slow it down in hopes of giving your people enough time to prepare...

Arrow Keys: Move in Direction Pressed
Space Bar: Shoot / Skip Screens
F1: Toggle Full Screen

By John F. Kaiser III of GPACgames.com for GBJAM 5!

Share screenshots of your HighScores with us on Twitter! @GPACgames

A little more about how the game came to be can be found on the GPAC Blog: http://gpacgames.com/a-bit-about-our-gbjam-5-entry-infeststation-endless-swarm/
